name: updateFilesetTemplate
description: Modify the values of specified fileset template.

id.description: ID of the fileset template to update.

body.description: Provide an object with the fileset template definition.

$ul: **allowBackupHiddenFoldersInNetworkMounts**: Include or exclude hidden folders inside locally-mounted remote file systems from backups.
**allowBackupNetworkMounts**: Include or exclude locally-mounted remote file systems from backups.
**useWindowsVss**: Use VSS during Windows backups.
**backupScriptErrorHandling**: Action taken if script fails. Options are "abort", "continue".
**backupScriptTimeout**: Number of seconds after which the script is killed if it has not completed execution.
**exceptions**
**excludes**
**includes**

**isArrayEnabled**: Boolean value that determines whether the fileset is array-enabled. Set to true to indicate that the fileset is array-enabled. Set to false to indicate that the fileset is not array-enabled. When a fileset is array-enabled, the includes must be top-level LVM logical volume mount points.
**name**
**operatingSystemType**: Operating system type of filesets created by template.
**postBackupScript**: Script to run after backup of this fileset ends.
**preBackupScript**: Script to run before backup of this fileset starts.
**shareType**
**hostCount**: Number of hosts where this template has been applied.
**isArchived**
**isCreatedByKupr**: Specifies whether this is created by a Kupr Host.
**primaryClusterId**
**shareCount**: Number of shares where this template has been applied.
